item.title: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. a 'predator,' unfit to lead HHS, Caroline Kennedy says
item.description: In a scathing letter Tuesday, Caroline Kennedy warned senators about her cousin, Robert F. Kennedy Jr., calling him a "predator."
